Package games.hex.view.graphical

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    Represents the board through use of a JPanel.
    BoardSetupPanel
    Allows the user to choose a size.
    ErrorDialog
    Is displayed whenever the user does something they cannot do.
    GraphicalBoardView
    Represents all GUI aspects of the game using a JFrame.
    HexTile
    Represents the HexTiles with a JButton
    MoveEvent
    A MoveEvent extends AWTEvent by exposing a constructor that take a Point source.
    PlayerChoicePanel
    Allows user to choose the player type.
    PlayerColorPanel
    Allows a user to choose the player's color.
    RulesPanel
    Allows the user to select the game's rules.
    TurnViewer
    Represents who is the current player and the winner.
